content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
My partner threatens to break up with me if I don't buy a Hermes.
That sounds very threatening. It seems like you have a lot of pent up pent up frustration over the situation. Do you think you would be prepared for the outcome if you were not in a relationship?
I am not prepared for that. We've been together for many years.
That sounds very difficult, especially since you' ve been together for so long. Have you tried talking to friends and family about this issue?
